00040 void MoveObject(Vec2 *Pos, enum Direction dirMove, float move_dist)
00041 {
00042         switch (dirMove)
00043         {
00044                 case LEFT:
00045                         Pos->x -= move_dist;
00046                         break;
00047                 case RIGHT:
00048                         Pos->x += move_dist;
00049                         break;
00050                 case UP:
00051                         Pos->y += move_dist;                            
00052                         break;
00053                 case DOWN:
00054                         Pos->y -= move_dist;
00055                         break;
00056         }
00057 }
